verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> Jeremiah<WH3414> the second<WH8145> time, while he<WH1931> was yet<WH5750> shut up<WH6113> in the court<WH2691> of the prison,<WH4307> saying,<WH559>
Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> the maker<WH6213> thereof, the LORD<WH3068> that formed<WH3335> it, to establish<WH3559> it; the LORD<WH3068> is his name;<WH8034>
Call <WH7121> unto<WH413> me, and I will answer<WH6030> thee, and show<WH5046> thee great<WH1419> and mighty<WH1219> things, which thou knowest<WH3045> not.<WH3808>

For <WH3588> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> concerning<WH5921> the houses<WH1004> of this<WH2063> city,<WH5892> and concerning<WH5921> the houses<WH1004> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> which are thrown down<WH5422> by<WH413> the mounts,<WH5550> and by<WH413> the sword;<WH2719>

They come<WH935> to fight<WH3898> with<WH854> the Chaldeans,<WH3778> but it is to fill<WH4390> them with<WH854> the dead bodies<WH6297> of men,<WH120> whom<WH834> I have slain<WH5221> in mine anger<WH639> and in my fury,<WH2534> and for<WH5921> all<WH3605> whose<WH834> wickedness<WH7451> I have hid<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from this<WH2063> city.<WH4480> <WH5892>
Behold, <WH2009> I will bring<WH4608> it health<WH724> and cure,<WH4832> and I will cure<WH7495> them, and will reveal<WH1540> unto them the abundance<WH6283> of peace<WH7965> and truth.<WH571>
And I will cause<WH853> the captivity<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and the captivity<WH7622> of Israel<WH3478> to return,<WH7725> and will build<WH1129> them, as at the first.<WH7223>

And I will cleanse<WH2891> them from all<WH4480> <WH3605> their iniquity,<WH5771> whereby<WH834> they have sinned<WH2398> against me; and I will pardon<WH5545> all<WH3605> their iniquities,<WH5771> whereby<WH834> they have sinned,<WH2398> and whereby<WH834> they have transgressed<WH6586> against me.

And it shall be<WH1961> to me a name<WH8034> of joy,<WH8342> a praise<WH8416> and an honor<WH8597> before all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> of the earth,<WH776> which<WH834> shall hear<WH8085> <WH853> all<WH3605> the good<WH2896> that<WH834> I<WH595> do unto<WH6213> them: and they shall fear<WH6342> and tremble<WH7264> for<WH5921> all<WH3605> the goodness<WH2896> and for<WH5921> all<WH3605> the prosperity<WH7965> that<WH834> I<WH595> procure<WH6213> unto it.

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Again<WH5750> there shall be heard<WH8085> in this<WH2088> place,<WH4725> which<WH834> ye<WH859> say<WH559> shall be desolate<WH2720> without<WH4480> <WH369> man<WH120> and without<WH4480> <WH369> beast,<WH929> even in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> that are desolate,<WH8074> without<WH4480> <WH369> man,<WH120> and without<WH4480> <WH369> inhabitant,<WH3427> and without<WH4480> <WH369> beast,<WH929>

The voice<WH6963> of joy,<WH8342> and the voice<WH6963> of gladness,<WH8057> the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom,<WH2860> and the voice<WH6963> of the bride,<WH3618> the voice<WH6963> of them that shall say,<WH559> Praise<WH3034> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts:<WH6635> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> is good;<WH2896> for<WH3588> his mercy<WH2617> endureth forever:<WH5769> and of them that shall bring<WH935> the sacrifice of praise<WH8426> into the house<WH1004> of the LORD.<WH3068> For<WH3588> I will cause to return<WH7725> <WH853> the captivity<WH7622> of the land,<WH776> as at the first,<WH7223> saith<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> Again<WH5750> in this<WH2088> place,<WH4725> which is desolate<WH2720> without<WH4480> <WH369> man<WH120> and without<WH5704> beast,<WH929> and in all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> thereof, shall be<WH1961> a habitation<WH5116> of shepherds<WH7462> causing their flocks<WH6629> to lie down.<WH7257>

In the cities<WH5892> of the mountains,<WH2022> in the cities<WH5892> of the vale,<WH8219> and in the cities<WH5892> of the south,<WH5045> and in the land<WH776> of Benjamin,<WH1144> and in the places about<WH5439> Jerusalem,<WH3389> and in the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> shall the flocks<WH6629> pass<WH5674> again<WH5750> under<WH5921> the hands<WH3027> of him that telleth<WH4487> them, saith<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>

Behold, <WH2009> the days<WH3117> come,<WH935> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that I will perform<WH6965> <WH853> that good<WH2896> thing<WH1697> which<WH834> I have promised<WH1696> unto<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and to<WH5704> the house<WH1004> of Judah.<WH3063>

In those<WH1992> days,<WH3117> and at that<WH1931> time,<WH6256> will I cause the Branch<WH6780> of righteousness<WH6666> to grow up<WH6779> unto David;<WH1732> and he shall execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> in the land.<WH776>

In those<WH1992> days<WH3117> shall Judah<WH3063> be saved,<WH3467> and Jerusalem<WH3389> shall dwell<WH7931> safely:<WH983> and this<WH2088> is the name wherewith<WH834> she shall be called,<WH7121> The LORD<WH3068> our righteousness.<WH6664>

For <WH3588> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> David<WH1732> shall never<WH3808> want<WH3772> a man<WH376> to sit<WH3427> upon<WH5921> the throne<WH3678> of the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478>

Neither <WH3808> shall the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> want<WH3772> a man<WH376> before<WH4480> <WH6440> me to offer<WH5927> burnt offerings,<WH5930> and to kindle<WH6999> meat offerings,<WH4503> and to do<WH6213> sacrifice<WH2077> continually.<WH3605> <WH3117>
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> If<WH518> ye can break<WH6565> <WH853> my covenant<WH1285> of the day,<WH3117> and my covenant<WH1285> of the night,<WH3915> and that there should not<WH1115> be<WH1961> day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> in their season;<WH6256>

Then may also<WH1571> my covenant<WH1285> be broken<WH6565> with<WH854> David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650> that he should not have<WH4480> <WH1961> a son<WH1121> to reign<WH4427> upon<WH5921> his throne;<WH3678> and with<WH854> the Levites<WH3881> the priests,<WH3548> my ministers.<WH8334>

As <WH834> the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> cannot<WH3808> be numbered,<WH5608> neither<WH3808> the sand<WH2344> of the sea<WH3220> measured:<WH4058> so<WH3651> will I multiply<WH7235> <WH853> the seed<WH2233> of David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650> and the Levites<WH3881> that minister unto<WH8334> me.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to<WH413> Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Considerest <WH7200> thou not<WH3808> what<WH4100> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> have spoken,<WH1696> saying,<WH559> The two<WH8147> families<WH4940> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath chosen,<WH977> he hath even cast them off?<WH3988> thus they have despised<WH5006> my people,<WH5971> that they should be no<WH4480> <WH1961> more<WH5750> a nation<WH1471> before<WH6440> them.

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> If<WH518> my covenant<WH1285> be not<WH3808> with day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> and if I have not<WH3808> appointed<WH7760> the ordinances<WH2708> of heaven<WH8064> and earth;<WH776>

Then <WH1571> will I cast away<WH3988> the seed<WH2233> of Jacob,<WH3290> and David<WH1732> my servant,<WH5650> so that I will not take<WH4480> <WH3947> any of his seed<WH4480> <WH2233> to be rulers<WH4910> over<WH413> the seed<WH2233> of Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3446> and Jacob:<WH3290> for<WH3588> I will cause<WH853> their captivity<WH7622> to return,<WH7725> and have mercy<WH7355> on them.
